role_description: An Ansible role that installs Kodi on nearly any platform
role_description_full_overview: This repository contains an Ansible role that installs Kodi on nearly any platform. Kodi is a free and open-source media player software application developed by the XBMC Foundation, a non-profit technology consortium. Kodi is available for multiple operating systems and hardware platforms, with a software 10-foot user interface for use with televisions and remote controls.
